text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Phew... That hit the spot.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Special Week... You're not<n>going back for more?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh, yeah. Five bowls will do... Sorry, I<n>should head out.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Aaah! Stop, stop! I can't be homesick<n>already! I just got
here!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (Does her stomach hurt, maybe?)

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka, sorry to disturb you<n>during your meal, but
can I have a<n>moment?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, yes... What is it?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's about this weekend's planned<n>scrimmage. There's an
open spot.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I know you were previously injured,<n>and this scrimmage
seems like a good<n>opportunity to get you back on the<n>
track. What do you think?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Racing in the scrimmage? Um... Well,<n>yes... If it means I can
run...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Isn't it ironic? I came to this school<n>and started entering
races because I<n>love running. But that's exactly what<n>lead
to my injury.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Something wrong? Are you still not<n>feeling up to it,
perchance?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah, um... Sorry. Can I have a little time<n>to think?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
...I see. Very well, then. I certainly<n>won't force you. But let
me know as<n>soon as you've made your decision.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: All right... Good night, Special Week.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah, good night, Suzuka.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(Tomorrow will bring more classes<n>and training... Will I be
able to get the<n>hang of things? Or...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(I really do want to race, but if I get<n>injured again at the
scrimmage...)

text_block_list.name: Suzuka and Special Week
text_block_list.text: Siiigh...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Hm-hm-hmmm. ♪ What to do? What<n>to do? ♪ Wonder if I
can find<n>something fun. To. Dooo—Oh!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Hey! New! Giiirl! What's up? Gotten<n>used to the academy
yet?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh, Teio...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? Why are you looking so glum?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Gotcha. So that's what's got you<n>down in the dumps.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I thought I was prepared to facesome tough challenges here, but thisis beyond anything I could haveimagined... Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hmm, I see, I see... Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: This won't do!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wh-what?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: This won't do! Won't do at all!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I know the classes and training<n>sessions are hard here, and
I get that<n>you're stressed because<n>everyone's so fast...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But if that's what the academyrepresents to you, then that's areal shame!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It is? Really?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yup! And I'll tell you why.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
You still haven't learned the very<n>best thing about this
place!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: The best thing? What could that be?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: If you wanna know... come with me!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Ah, wait, Teio!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Come on! Hurry up and follow me!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: W-wait, please! Huh? Why am I<n>getting déjà vu?!
